archival_memory.diabetes_diagnosis: Type 2 Diabetes, diagnosed about ten years ago
archival_memory.diabetes_management: diet changes, cutting out sugary snacks, watching carb intake, increasing physical activity
archival_memory.blood_sugar_monitoring: mindful about checking blood sugar levels
archival_memory.exercise_importance: 30-minute walk after dinner helps stabilize glucose levels
archival_memory.hypertension_management: hypertension, managed with medication and lifestyle changes
archival_memory.physical_therapy: recommended by doctor, has helped a lot
archival_memory.lifestyle_changes_osteoarthritis: ergonomic chairs, good shoes, avoiding overuse of joints
archival_memory.hypothyroidism_management: hypothyroidism diagnosed in early 40s, symptoms included exhaustion and weight gain
archival_memory.thyroid_treatment: medication management, regular check-ins with doctor
archival_memory.gallbladder_surgery: gallbladder removal due to severe gallbladder attack
archival_memory.gallstones_history: dealt with gallstones for years before surgery
archival_memory.digestion_changes_post_surgery: digestion has changed since surgery, need to avoid fried and greasy foods
archival_memory.seasonal_allergies: seasonal allergies that flare up every spring in Kansas
archival_memory.pneumonia_history: had pneumonia a couple of years ago, leading to diligence in vaccinations
archival_memory.doctor_appointments_management: juggling multiple appointments with endocrinologist, primary care doctor, and arthritis specialist
archival_memory.tracking_system: using a notebook to track appointments, medication changes, and notes about health
archival_memory.note_taking_preference: prefers writing things down over using online patient portals
archival_memory.health_philosophy: focus on staying healthy, taking it one step at a time, listening to the body
archival_memory.proactive_health_management: importance of being proactive in managing health
